checks.name: Visual Accessibility
checks.details: High contrast: true, Reduced motion: true, Focus styles: true

checks.name: Screen Reader Support
checks.details: Live regions: true, Hidden content: true, Announcements: true

issues.issue: Limited use of semantic HTML elements
issues.recommendation: Add more semantic elements like main, section, nav

recommendations: Excellent accessibility implementation! Consider periodic audits to maintain standards.
Test with actual screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Validate with automated tools like axe-core
Conduct user testing with people who use assistive technologies
Consider WCAG 2.1 AAA compliance for enhanced accessibility
